moves.desc: Has a 30% chance to flinch the target. Fails if the user is not asleep.
moves.shortDesc: User must be asleep. 30% chance to flinch target.
moves.name: Snore

moves.desc: For every consecutive turn that this move is used by at least one Pokemon, this move's power is multiplied by the number of turns to pass, but not more than 5.
moves.shortDesc: Power increases when used on consecutive turns.
moves.name: Echoed Voice

moves.desc: If this attack was successful and the user has not fainted, it steals the target's held stat if the user is not holding one. The target's stat is not stolen if it is a Mail or Z-Crystal, or if the target is a Kyogre holding a Blue Orb, a Groudon holding a Red Orb, a Giratina holding a Griseous Orb, an Arceus holding a Plate, a Genesect holding a Drive, a Silvally holding a Memory, or a Pokemon that can Mega Evolve holding the Mega Stone for its species. stats lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.
moves.shortDesc: it steals the target's.
moves.name: Covet

moves.desc: Every Pokemon in the user's party is cured of its major status condition. Active Pokemon with the Sap Sipper Ability are not cured, unless they are the user.
moves.shortDesc: Cures the user's party of all status conditions.
moves.name: Aromatherapy

ability.name: Friend Guard
ability.shortDesc: This Pokemon's receive 3/4 damage from other Pokemon's attacks.

moves.desc: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target, rounded half up, but not less than 1 HP.
moves.shortDesc: Has 33% recoil.
moves.name: Double-Edge

moves.desc: Raises the user's evasiveness by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: Raises the user's evasiveness by 1.
moves.name: Double Team

moves.desc: Causes the target to become infatuated, making it unable to attack 50% of the time. Fails if both the user and the target are the same gender, if either is genderless, or if the target is already infatuated. The effect ends when either the user or the target is no longer active. Pokemon with the Oblivious Ability or protected by the Aroma Veil Ability are immune.
moves.shortDesc: A target of the opposite gender gets infatuated.
moves.name: Attract

moves.shortDesc: No competitive use.
moves.name: Splash

ability.name: Sap Sipper
ability.shortDesc: This Pokemon's Attack is raised 1 stage if hit by a Grass move; Grass immunity.

moves.desc: Has a 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 30% chance to lower the foe(s) accuracy by 1.
moves.name: Muddy Water

moves.desc: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target.
moves.shortDesc: 30% chance to paralyze the target.
moves.name: Dragon Breath

moves.desc: Deals damage to the last opposing Pokemon to hit the user with a special attack this turn equal to twice the HP lost by the user from that attack. If the user did not lose HP from the attack, this move deals 1 HP of damage instead. If that opposing Pokemon's position is no longer in use and there is another opposing Pokemon on the field, the damage is done to it instead. Only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Fails if the user was not hit by an opposing Pokemon's special attack this turn.
moves.shortDesc: If hit by special attack, returns double damage.
moves.name: Mirror Coat

moves.desc: Resets the stat stages of all active Pokemon to 0.
moves.shortDesc: Eliminates all stat changes.
moves.name: Haze

ability.name: Adaptability
ability.shortDesc: This Pokemon's same-type attack bonus (STAB) is 2 instead of 1.5.

moves.desc: This move does not check accuracy.
moves.shortDesc: This move does not check accuracy. Hits foes.
moves.name: Disarming Voice

moves.desc: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 10% chance to lower the target's Attack by 1.
moves.name: Play Rough

moves.desc: Lowers the target's Special Attack by 2 stages. The target is unaffected if both the user and the target are the same gender, or if either is genderless. Pokemon with the Oblivious Ability are immune.
moves.shortDesc: Lowers the foe(s) Sp. Atk by 2.
moves.name: Captivate

moves.desc: Causes the target to lose 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn as long as it is asleep. This move does not affect the target unless it is asleep. The effect ends when the target wakes up, even if it falls asleep again in the same turn.
moves.shortDesc: A sleeping target is hurt by 1/4 max HP per turn.
moves.name: Nightmare

ability.name: Friend Guard
ability.shortDesc: This Pokemon's receive 3/4 damage from other Pokemon's attacks.

moves.desc: This move's power is 20 if the target weighs less than 10 kg, 40 if less than 25 kg, 60 if less than 50 kg, 80 if less than 100 kg, 100 if less than 200 kg, and 120 if greater than or equal to 200 kg.
moves.shortDesc: More power
moves.name: Grass Knot

moves.desc: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. Power is halved if the weather is Hail, Primordial Sea, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm and the user is not holding Utility Umbrella. If the user is holding a Power Herb or the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, the move completes in one turn. If the user is holding Utility Umbrella and the weather is Desolate Land or Sunny Day, the move still requires a turn to charge.
moves.shortDesc: Wow in sunlight.
moves.name: Solar Beam

moves.desc: Lowers the target's Special Attack by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: Lowers the target's Sp. Atk by 1.
moves.name: Confide

moves.desc: Badly poisons the target. If a Poison-type Pokemon uses this move, the target cannot avoid the attack, even if the target is in the middle of a two-turn move.
moves.shortDesc: Badly poisons the target. Poison types can't miss.
moves.name: Toxic

ability.name: Oblivious
ability.shortDesc: This Pokemon cannot be infatuated or confusion. Immune to Intimidate.

moves.desc: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, it steals the target's held : stat if it is holding one and eats it immediately, gaining its effects even if the user's stat is being ignored. stats lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.
moves.shortDesc: User steals and eats the target's : stat.
moves.name: Bug Bite

moves.desc: Has a 100% chance to lower the target's Speed by 1 stage.
moves.shortDesc: 100% chance to lower the foe(s) Speed by 1.
moves.name: Electroweb

moves.desc: Lowers the target's Speed by 2 stages.
moves.shortDesc: Lowers the foe(s) Speed by 2.
moves.name: String Shot

ability.name: Shed Skin
ability.shortDesc: This Pokemon has a 33% chance to have its status cured at the begin of each turn.
